argument.name: {wrap= }
argument.description: Character. The leading {wrap= and trailing } characters are required.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. An integer value for the maximum length of the line.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: One or more {wrap=Width} statements may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() function.
